page.title: 15Children's Recreation
page.content: There are no clubs for children in our area. Of 19 children questioned, 14 had more than one hobby. Between them the 19 children belonged to 11 different clubs travelling as far as Worcester to take part in club activities. The most popular regular hobby is swimming (8), cycle-riding (4), playing a musical instrument (4), motor-cycling (3), judo (2), ballet (2), reading (2), computer (2) and Cubs (2). Other hobbies mentioned were model-making, drawing, Brownies, stamp-collecting, rugby, tennis, cricket, water ski-ing, horse-riding, Scouts, karate, squash, sub-aqua, collecting old pottery, shooting, video watching and listening to records.
